sn44.5:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto, ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye …pe…
sn44.5:1.3: “Ko nu kho, avuso, hetu ko paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.5:1.4: “Rupe kho, avuso, avigataragassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipasassa avigataparilahassa avigatatanhassa ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.5:1.9: vinnane avigataragassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipasassa avigataparilahassa avigatatanhassa ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa hoti.
sn44.5:1.15: vinnane vigataragassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipasassa vigataparilahassa vigatatanhassa ‘hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti …pe…
sn44.5:1.16: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.5:1.17: Ayam kho, avuso, hetu, ayam paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti.
